description.value: Your mother was a hag. Your heterochromatic eyes are the most obvious signifier of this parentage, but you likely also have a slighter build, paler skin, and darker hair than most members of your other parent's ancestry. You gain the changeling trait. You also gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Low-Light Vision], or you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.Darkvision] if your ancestry already has low-light vision. You can select from changeling feats and feats from your other parent's ancestry whenever you gain an ancestry feat.
